verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> again to me saying,<WH559>
"Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> prophesy<WH5012> and say,<WH559> 'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "Wail,<WH3213> 'Alas<WH1929> for the day!<WH3117>'
"For the day<WH3117> is near,<WH7138> Even the day<WH3117> of the Lord<WH3068> is near;<WH7138> It will be a day<WH3117> of clouds,<WH6051> A time<WH6256> [of doom] for the nations.<WH1471>

"And a sword<WH2719> will come<WH935> upon Egypt,<WH4714> And anguish<WH2479> will be in Ethiopia,<WH3568> When the slain<WH2491> fall<WH5307> in Egypt,<WH4714> They take<WH3947> away her wealth,<WH1995> And her foundations<WH3247> are torn<WH2040> down.<WH2040>

"Ethiopia,<WH3568> Put,<WH6316> Lud,<WH3865> all<WH3605> Arabia,<WH6152> Libya,<WH3864> and the people<WH1121> of the land<WH776> that is in league<WH1285> will fall<WH5307> with them by the sword.<WH2719>"

'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord,<WH3068> "Indeed, those who support<WH5564> Egypt<WH4714> will fall,<WH5307> And the pride<WH1347> of her power<WH5797> will come<WH3381> down;<WH3381> From Migdol<WH4024> [to] Syene<WH5482> They will fall<WH5307> within her by the sword,<WH2719>" Declares<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> God.<WH3068>
"And they will be desolate<WH8074> In the midst<WH8432> of the desolated<WH8074> lands;<WH776> And her cities<WH5892> will be In the midst<WH8432> of the devastated<WH2717> cities.<WH5892>
"And they will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord,<WH3068> When I set<WH5414> a fire<WH784> in Egypt<WH4714> And all<WH3605> her helpers<WH5826> are broken.<WH7665>

"On that day<WH3117> messengers<WH4397> will go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> from Me in ships<WH6716> to frighten<WH2729> secure<WH983> Ethiopia;<WH3568> and anguish<WH2479> will be on them as on the day<WH3117> of Egypt;<WH4714> for, behold,<WH2009> it comes!<WH935>"

'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "I will also make the multitude<WH1995> of Egypt<WH4714> cease<WH7673> By the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon.<WH894>

"He and his people<WH5971> with him, The most<WH6184> ruthless<WH6184> of the nations,<WH1471> Will be brought<WH935> in to destroy<WH7843> the land;<WH776> And they will draw<WH9553> their swords<WH2719> against<WH5921> Egypt<WH4714> And fill<WH4390> the land<WH776> with the slain.<WH2491>

"Moreover, I will make<WH5414> the Nile<WH2975> canals<WH2975> dry<WH2724> And sell<WH4376> the land<WH776> into the hands<WH3027> of evil<WH7451> men.<WH7451> And I will make<WH8074> the land<WH776> desolate,<WH8074> And all<WH4393> that is in it, By the hand<WH3027> of strangers;<WH2114> I, the Lord,<WH3068> have spoken.<WH1696>"

'Thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> "I will also destroy the idols<WH6> And make the images<WH1544> cease<WH457> from Memphis.<WH7673> And there will no<WH5297> longer<WH3808> be a prince<WH5750> in the land<WH5387> of Egypt;<WH776> And I will put<WH4714> fear<WH5414> in the land<WH3374> of Egypt.<WH776>
"And I will make<WH8074> Pathros<WH6624> desolate,<WH8074> Set<WH5414> a fire<WH784> in Zoan,<WH6814> And execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> on Thebes.<WH4996>
"And I will pour<WH8210> out My wrath<WH2534> on Sin,<WH5512> The stronghold<WH4581> of Egypt;<WH4714> I will also cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> the multitude<WH1995> of Thebes.<WH4996>

"And I will set<WH5414> a fire<WH784> in Egypt;<WH4714> Sin<WH5512> will writhe<WH9123> in anguish,<WH9123> Thebes<WH4996> will be breached,<WH1234> And Memphis<WH5297> [will have] distresses<WH6862> daily.<WH3119>
"The young<WH970> men<WH970> of On<WH204> and of Pi-beseth Will fall<WH5307> by the sword,<WH2719> And the women<WH1992> will go<WH1980> into captivity.<WH7628>

"And in Tehaphnehes<WH8471> the day<WH3117> will be dark<WH2821> When I break<WH7665> there<WH8033> the yoke<WH4133> bars<WH4133> of Egypt.<WH4714> Then the pride<WH1347> of her power<WH5797> will cease<WH7673> in her; A cloud<WH6051> will cover<WH3680> her, And her daughters<WH1323> will go<WH1980> into captivity.<WH7628>
"Thus I will execute<WH6213> judgments<WH8201> on Egypt,<WH4714> And they will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>"' "

And it came<WH1961> about in the eleventh<WH259> <WH6240> year,<WH8141> in the first<WH7223> [month,<WH2320>] on the seventh<WH7651> of the month, that the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me saying,<WH559>

"Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> I have broken<WH7665> the arm<WH2220> of Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt;<WH4714> and, behold,<WH2009> it has not been bound<WH2280> up for healing<WH7499> or wrapped<WH2280> with a bandage,<WH2848> that it may be strong<WH2388> to hold<WH8610> the sword.<WH2719>

"Therefore,<WH3651> thus<WH3541> says<WH559> the Lord<WH136> God,<WH3068> 'Behold,<WH2009> I am against<WH413> Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714> and will break<WH7665> his arms,<WH2220> both the strong<WH2389> and the broken;<WH7665> and I will make the sword<WH2719> fall<WH5307> from his hand.<WH3027>
'And I will scatter<WH6327> the Egyptians<WH4714> among the nations<WH1471> and disperse<WH2219> them among the lands.<WH776>

'For I will strengthen<WH2388> the arms<WH2220> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> and put<WH5414> My sword<WH2719> in his hand;<WH3027> and I will break<WH7665> the arms<WH2220> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> so that he will groan<WH5008> before<WH6440> him with the groanings<WH5009> of a wounded<WH2491> man.<WH2491>

'Thus I will strengthen<WH2388> the arms<WH2220> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> but the arms<WH2220> of Pharaoh<WH6547> will fall.<WH5307> Then they will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord,<WH3068> when I put<WH5414> My sword<WH2719> into the hand<WH3027> of the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> and he stretches<WH5186> it out against<WH413> the land<WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
'When I scatter<WH6327> the Egyptians<WH4714> among the nations<WH1471> and disperse<WH2219> them among the lands,<WH776> then they will know<WH3045> that I am the Lord.<WH3068>' "
